title: bluescreen from opening my fresh new font
content:
have you ever had this happening to you?  
i am using fontographer 4.1 export to truetype didn't work (windwos said the font was currupted), and so i tried exporting to Type1(?)

any idea why this happened?  
maybe i shouldn't use fontographer, it's so old!
author: smoothy

comments.content: Sure it's old, but there are gazillions of old fonts made with it that are still working just fine.
